name: alcant-website
description: Alcant E-commerce Website - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cp -r out/* ../ && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin-panel && npm run dev"

author: ClickAsia Web
